metadata.description: The BattleVerse project is an NFT-based online first-person shooter game. Our first NFT collection will allow everyone who mints to be able to receive the BattleVerse Limited Edition rifle when we launch our NFT weapon packs. Also if you mint 5+ NFTs you will be able to join our EARLY access group and try the game in ALPHA and BETA which is LIVE, as we already have over 25 Alpha testers. Supporting this project will only further show that NFTs do have a use case, as the BattleVerse NFTs will unlock weapons, skins, gear and more.

attributes.value: dark blue light blue leg holster
